function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inadequate implementation of self-protection measures such as wearing face masks, hand washing, and ventilation","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adherence to maintaining distance from patients with a fever","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate understanding or implementation of effective self-protection measures","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unreliable early stage estimated number of infected humans due to unknown virus characteristics and rapid interventions.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Differences in patterns of movement of crowds and levels of economic development make it difficult to clarify which country’s data are most appropriate for simulating the trend of covid-19.","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Use of genetic algorithm to estimate parameters for dynamic model of covid-19 spread.","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Large-scale detection program leading to underreporting of asymptomatic cases","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty in using early small sample data to predict the epidemic situation","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty in confirming the actual number of infected people who had already exited but had not been tested or had no symptoms","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low adherence to self-protection measures","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Self-protection measures do not fundamentally cut off the path of spread of the virus","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Influence of self-protection measures on the spread of covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of self-protection measures under strict quarantine measures","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective self-protection measures under strict quarantine","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Study of covid-19 interventions","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Model validation under covid-19 interventions","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low proportion of people effectively wearing face masks","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difference between free spread trend of covid-19 in wuhan and early data from other countries","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Errors in case detection and data recording in wuhan","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complex natural and social factors influencing epidemic prevention","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difference between estimated covid-19 trend and actual trend in wuhan","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difference between population distribution and actual situation","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Differences in geographical environmental factors impacting the effectiveness of covid-19 prevention and control measures","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Focus on a generalized model without simulation for the fine-grained location of patients","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Problems with scientific verification of spread models","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Analyzing crowd aggregation and interaction may lead to an increased risk of disease propagation if not handled carefully.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Hospital isolation measures were effective in reducing the number of infected humans but had a small effect on the arrival time of the maximum number of infected humans and the duration of the covid-19 outbreak.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Self-protection measures were effective in reducing the number of infected humans and delaying the arrival of the peak number of infected humans, but had little effect under stricter quarantine measures.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The study analyzed the impact of quarantine, self-protection, and hospital isolation measures to slow the spread of covid-19, with high interpretability and geographical mapping of model parameters for practical intervention significance.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reference to external sources without context","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 globally","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Highly contagious nature and relatively long incubation period of sars-cov-2 can lead to silent carriers and high basic reproductive number for covid-19 virus.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Susceptibility of sars-cov-2 to heat and ultraviolet uv light may affect virus transmission under certain conditions.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Human-to-human transmission of covid-19 through respiratory droplets","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of covid-19 via unsymptomatic individuals","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate clinical understanding of covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reviewing a small subset of literature on covid-19 may lead to incomplete understanding of the disease and its characteristics.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of comprehensive review of the covid-19 outbreak and its potential implications","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"No work in the existing literature reviewing the role of emerging technologies in managing the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global spread of covid-19 with distinct stages of transmission","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sporadic cases of covid-19 leading to local transmission","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Clusters of covid-19 cases with unknown transmission source","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Community transmission leading to large outbreaks and high number of incidents and deaths","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid outbreak of covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 causing a decline in international visitor arrivals and tourism receipts","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Massive increase in network bandwidth consumption","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to distinguish covid-19 symptoms from common flu, leading to challenges in determining testing criteria.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate contact tracing","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of compliance with hand hygiene, social distancing, and other preventative measures","category":"Health","confidence":"High"}]}
